Rot-12 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 12 positions forward in the alphabet. Encode the following message into rot-12.

Rot-12 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 12 positions forward in the alphabet. Encode the following message into rot-12.
Original text: "Then apart, we enter painting and personal aspects."

Rot-12 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 12 positions forward in the alphabet. Encode the following message into rot-12.
Original text: "No longer just a developer’s objective, the bi-management extension is a validation of the aims of corporations both within and beyond the parameters of rooms."

Za xazsqd vgef m pqhqxabqd’e anvqofuhq, ftq nu-ymzmsqyqzf qjfqzeuaz ue m hmxupmfuaz ar ftq muye ar oadbadmfuaze naft iuftuz mzp nqkazp ftq bmdmyqfqde ar daaye.

Rot-12 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 12 positions forward in the alphabet. Encode the following message into rot-12.

Rot-12 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 12 positions forward in the alphabet. Encode the following message into rot-12.
Original text: "Much as it does today, Texas comprised as many religions, ethnicities and resources."
